Name: require_user_story_ready_status
Description: Only include user stories with acceptable status for planning

Name: require_feature_defined_effort
Description: Only consider features with estimated effort present

Name: disallow_blocked_tasks
Description: Exclude tasks currently blocked from commitment

Name: prefer_high_team_availability
Description: Favor teams with higher availability when assigning work

Name: limit_daily_scrum_duration
Description: Daily events must respect the 15-minute timebox

Name: ensure_sprint_with_goal
Description: Each sprint must have a defined goal

Name: require_backlog_currency
Description: Backlog must be recently updated before planning

Name: limit_sprint_backlog_status
Description: Only plan items into active or planned sprint backlogs

Name: guard_budget_threshold
Description: Project selection must respect budget cap

Name: require_stakeholder_relevance
Description: Invite stakeholders relevant to presented features

Name: ensure_sprint_dates_valid
Description: Sprint start must precede end date
